findings.headline_es: 6 de cada 10 estudiantes en riesgo aun no reciben deteccion temprana
findings.headline_en: 6 in 10 at-risk students still lack early detection — an opportunity to reach them sooner
findings.explanation_es: Actualmente, el 63.3% de los estudiantes hispanohablantes que abandonan la escuela no son identificados a tiempo. Mejorar la deteccion temprana para este grupo podria permitir intervenciones preventivas que lleguen a la mayoria de los estudiantes en riesgo.
findings.explanation_en: Currently, 63.3% of Spanish-speaking students who drop out are not identified in time. Improving early detection for this group could enable preventive interventions that reach the majority of at-risk students.

findings.headline_es: La deteccion tiene dos caras: estudiantes indigenas reciben exceso de alertas mientras hispanohablantes quedan sin atencion
findings.headline_en: Detection has two sides: indigenous students receive excess alerts while Spanish-speakers go undetected
findings.explanation_es: El modelo identifica mejor a estudiantes de lenguas indigenas (FNR=21.6%) pero genera demasiadas alertas innecesarias (FPR=52.1%). Para hispanohablantes ocurre lo inverso: pasan desapercibidos con un FNR del 63.3%. Equilibrar ambos lados beneficiaria a todos los estudiantes.
findings.explanation_en: The model identifies more indigenous-language students (FNR=21.6%) but generates too many unnecessary alerts (FPR=52.1%). For Spanish-speakers the pattern reverses: they go undetected at a 63.3% rate. Balancing both sides would benefit all students.

metric_source.label: FPR for Other Indigenous language group

findings.headline_es: 3 de cada 4 estudiantes indigenas urbanos en riesgo necesitan mejor cobertura
findings.headline_en: 3 in 4 urban indigenous students at risk fall through the gaps between rural and urban detection
findings.explanation_es: Los estudiantes indigenas en zonas urbanas presentan la mayor brecha de deteccion (FNR=75.3%). Aunque son una muestra pequena (n=89), el patron sugiere que la deteccion actual se centra en factores rurales y no captura la vulnerabilidad linguistica en ciudades. Estos estudiantes podrian beneficiarse de indicadores urbanos complementarios.
findings.explanation_en: Urban indigenous students have the largest detection gap (FNR=75.3%). While the sample is small (n=89), the pattern suggests current detection focuses on rural factors and does not capture linguistic vulnerability in cities. These students could benefit from complementary urban indicators.

findings.stat: Top-5 SHAP features: age, nightlight_intensity_z, is_working, census_indigenous_lang_pct_z, census_literacy_rate_z; 0/5 overlap with logistic regression identity features
findings.headline_es: Donde vive un estudiante predice la desercion mas que quien es — la solucion esta en los territorios
findings.headline_en: Where a student lives predicts dropout more than who they are — the solution lies in places, not people
findings.explanation_es: Los 5 factores mas influyentes son estructurales: edad, luminosidad nocturna (proxy de urbanizacion), situacion laboral, proporcion de lengua indigena del distrito y alfabetizacion censal. Esto significa que las condiciones del territorio determinan el riesgo, lo cual abre la puerta a intervenciones territoriales focalizadas.
findings.explanation_en: The 5 most influential factors are structural: age, nightlight intensity (urbanization proxy), employment status, district indigenous language prevalence, and census literacy rate. This means territorial conditions drive risk, which opens the door to targeted place-based interventions.

findings.headline_es: La region Selva necesita atencion focalizada: 6 de cada 10 estudiantes en riesgo aun no son alcanzados
findings.headline_en: The Amazon region needs targeted attention: 6 in 10 at-risk students are not yet reached
findings.explanation_es: En la Selva, el 59.3% de los estudiantes que abandonan no son identificados a tiempo. La alta dispersion geografica, menor conectividad y diversidad de poblaciones indigenas hacen de esta region la que mas se beneficiaria de estrategias de deteccion adaptadas a su realidad.
findings.explanation_en: In the Selva (Amazon basin), 59.3% of students who drop out are not identified in time. High geographic dispersion, lower connectivity, and diverse indigenous populations make this the region that would benefit most from detection strategies adapted to its reality.

findings.stat: Pearson r = -0.071 between predictions and admin rates
findings.headline_es: Los datos individuales y distritales cuentan historias diferentes — combinarlos fortaleceria la deteccion
findings.headline_en: Individual and district data tell different stories (r = -0.071) — combining them could strengthen detection
findings.explanation_es: La correlacion entre las predicciones individuales agregadas y las tasas distritales del MINEDU es practicamente nula (r = -0.071). Esto no significa que una fuente sea incorrecta: cada una captura aspectos distintos del fenomeno. Integrar ambas perspectivas podria ofrecer una imagen mas completa del riesgo de desercion.
findings.explanation_en: The correlation between aggregated individual predictions and MINEDU district dropout rates is near zero (r = -0.071). This does not mean either source is wrong: each captures different aspects of the phenomenon. Integrating both perspectives could provide a more complete picture of dropout risk.

metric_source.label: Pearson r between model predictions and admin dropout rates

findings.headline_es: Buena noticia: la equidad de genero funciona — solo 3.3% de diferencia entre ninos y ninas
findings.headline_en: Good news: gender equity works — only 3.3% detection gap between boys and girls
findings.explanation_es: A diferencia de la lengua y la geografia, la deteccion trata de manera casi equitativa a ninos y ninas, con una brecha de solo 3.3%. Este resultado positivo demuestra que la equidad es alcanzable y puede servir de modelo para cerrar las brechas en otras dimensiones.
findings.explanation_en: Unlike language and geography, detection treats boys and girls nearly equally, with a gap of just 3.3%. This positive result shows that equity is achievable and can serve as a model for closing gaps in other dimensions.

metric_source.label: Maximum FNR gap between sex groups

findings.headline_es: Estos patrones no dependen del algoritmo — la solucion es mejor informacion, no mejor tecnologia
findings.headline_en: These patterns persist regardless of algorithm — the path forward is better data, not better models
findings.explanation_es: Dos algoritmos completamente distintos (LightGBM y XGBoost) producen resultados casi identicos (ratio = 1.0037). Esto confirma que las brechas detectadas son estructurales, no un artefacto del modelo. La solucion no es cambiar el algoritmo sino enriquecer los datos con indicadores mas cercanos a la realidad de cada comunidad.
findings.explanation_en: Two completely different algorithms (LightGBM and XGBoost) produce nearly identical results (ratio = 1.0037). This confirms that the detected gaps are structural, not a model artifact. The solution is not to change the algorithm but to enrich the data with indicators closer to each community's reality.
